about_the_game:
A damned tower

Venture into this dungeon crawler with roguelike elements where you will have to face bloodthirsty skeletons and other creatures. Reach the end of the tower and discover the mysteries that await there.

In this adventure you will live the story of Dorian, an adventurer who has been on the trail of a powerful sorcerer for years. However, when he finally finds him he discovers that the situation is worse than he expected.

Game features

  • Dungeon game where you must clear each floor before you can continue advancing. After each floor you can choose between a chest with improved equipment or go up to the next floor, where the chances of loot will be better, but the enemies will be tougher.
  • Simple mechanics! Pick up the game whenever you want, with no learning curve.
  • Define your way of playing! Choose from different types of weapons and talents. Feel free to choose your way forward.
  • Forge your custom team! If what you find on your adventure doesn't convince you, create your own dream team with the stats you need.
  • A different style! More friendly and suitable for all audiences. Ideal for those who want to get started in this genre and refreshing for the most experienced.
  • An unexpected story that you must discover by exploring the dungeons.
  • Different bosses and powerful enemies that will appear as you progress.
  • -------------DEMO EXCLUSIVE-------------
  • Only 4 dungeons models (complete version have +30)
  • Highest player level is locked at 5 (complete version 50)
  • Highest floor is locked at 5 (complete version is 50)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Make your way to the top of the tower and stop the sorcerer who controls it to free the unwary people who got there and are now cursed. Trade, craft, upgrade your skills and loot as you discover its history, as the higher you go the better the reward.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
